results.content: Good course for a backend dev looking to get more vue experience. Probably a little too fast for outright beginners
results.content_html: Good course for a backend dev looking to get more vue experience. Probably a little too fast for outright beginners

results.content: I have been looking everywhere a mevn fullstack tutorial and this is exactly what I hoped it would be. Great pace, great teacher!
results.content_html: I have been looking everywhere a mevn fullstack tutorial and this is exactly what I hoped it would be. Great pace, great teacher!

results.content: Avoid like the plague. This course is badly outdated and nothing works. It is a complete waste of time to progress through the videos and realise the whole version of Vue they use is old and therefore the code examples in the course do not exist in the framework anymore. This is not a way to pick up a new skill at all especially after PAYING MONEY for it. Better examples on YouTube than this rubbish. I have requested a refund as a result.

results.content: This is one of the best courses I have taken - very nice!
results.content_html: This is one of the best courses I have taken - very nice!

results.content: There are a couple of things out of date and a couple of mistakes but this course has a TON of techniques and real world implementations. I learned a lot from both instructors and I plan to use techniques from both in my next project. Very thorough and very complex projects!!
results.content_html: There are a couple of things out of date and a couple of mistakes but this course has a TON of techniques and real world implementations. I learned a lot from both instructors and I plan to use techniques from both in my next project. Very thorough and very complex projects!!

results.content:
Very good course in the eyes of someone pretty new to fullstack javascript frameworks!
Would get five stars from me if some pauzes would have been integrated after new pieces of code have been written instead of jumping to the next section/file instantly. 
This would make pausing and following the code easier and not having to pause and scroll back to the right moment.
results.content_html:

results.content:
Good course. My goal is to build an app using this exact environment. Great to understand all the moving parts of a MEVN app. 

Instructor does go pretty fast, so strap on your seatbelt!
results.content_html:
Good course. My goal is to build an app using this exact environment. Great to understand all the moving parts of a MEVN app.

Instructor does go pretty fast, so strap on your seatbelt!

results.content: Very well structured, concise and comprehensible!
Too fast, can't even see what the instructor is typing before it jumps to the next screen. Extremely hard to follow along.
results.content_html: Too fast, can't even see what the instructor is typing before it jumps to the next screen. Extremely hard to follow along.

results.content: Support for this course is non-existent

So far, this is the first of three VueJS (MEVN type courses) that I've tried. All were written approx 2 yrs ago, but this one is the first time I have actually been able to follow along without getting lost...

I am not a professional coder, just a hobbyist looking to write a couple of personal Apps. I have a good understanding of HTML, CSS and some JS. My JS knowledge though is minimal - I can read more than I can write....

So, Bravo.
